msContents.summary:
A collection of medical, cookery and veterinary receipt, etc. : mainly by two hands, one c. 1650, the other dated 1731-1739.

The original hand is that of ff. 1-82, of which ff. 1-38 are cookery receipts and the remainder medical. It also appears on 7 pp. at the end, containing veterinary receipts.

At the end also are 11 pp. headed 'Dialectica est ars bene disserendi', partly in English and partly in Latin, by a different hand, also c. 1650.

supportDesc.extent:
7 bl ll. + 87 ff. + 26 ll. + 97 bl. ll. + 5 bl. ll. 8vo. A number of leaves have been cut out.
11 16

handDesc.handNote:
Mainly by two hands, one c. 1650, the other dated 1731-1739.

The original hand is that of ff. 1-82, of which ff. 1-38 are cookery receipts and the remainder medical. It also appears on 7 pp. at the end, containing veterinary receipts.

At the end also are 11 pp. headed 'Dialectica est ars bene disserendi', partly in English and partly in Latin, by a different hand, also c. 1650.

binding.p: Original vellum gilt binding defective, both clasps wanting.

bibl.title: Catalogue of Western Manuscripts on Medicine and Science in the Wellcome Historical Medical Library
bibl.author: S. A. J. Moorat
bibl.publisher: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine

surrogates.bibl: In addition, a microfilm copy is held as AMS/MF/232.

listBibl.bibl: Published (in microfilm form) in Women in Medicine: Remedy Books, 1533 - 1865, ed. Sara Pennell (Woodbridge, Connecticut: Primary Source Microfilm, 2004).

revisionDesc.change: Manual edits done by VS after XML transformation scenario
